mapper.sql: ID, TEACHER_ID, WORK_TYPE, WORK_URL, WORK_UPLOAD_TIME, WORK_REMARK
mapper.insert:
insert into RUICAI.EDUCATION_WORK
ID,
TEACHER_ID,
WORK_TYPE,
WORK_URL,
WORK_UPLOAD_TIME,
WORK_REMARK,
#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{teacherId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{workType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{workUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{workUploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{workRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update RUICAI.EDUCATION_WORK
TEACHER_ID = #{teacherId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORK_TYPE = #{workType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORK_URL = #{workUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
WORK_UPLOAD_TIME = #{workUploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WORK_REMARK = #{workRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update RUICAI.EDUCATION_WORK set TEACHER_ID = #{teacherId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORK_TYPE = #{workType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORK_URL = #{workUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WORK_UPLOAD_TIME = #{workUploadTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, WORK_REMARK = #{workRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT "COUNT"(EW."ID") FROM
EDUCATION_WORK ew JOIN SYSTEM_DICTIONARY sd ON EW.WORK_TYPE = SD."ID" WHERE EW.WORK_TYPE = ( SELECT "ID" FROM SYSTEM_DICTIONARY WHERE DICTIONARY_VALUE = #{workType} )
AND TEACHER_ID = #{teacherId}
AND WORK_UPLOAD_TIME > to_date(#{workUploadTime},'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss')
